TopicTitle: Do you think Squad should leave the Round8 Toroidal Tank alone?

Articles.Content:
Todays DevNotes came out and I am greatly upset by the news that one of my favorite tanks is being rendered useless. It's a great tank for fine tuning fuel content, it's an eye pleasing design, it works great for rover jump jets, it has a ton of uses. Now, it will apparently have Xenon. I would like to see them reconsider this change. What do you think?

EDIT:

Success!

Max announced on Squadcast that there will be a new Xenon tank and the Round-8 will remain unchanged! Thank you Squad!

My current save actually uses a pair of Round8s to provide enough delta-v for my Mun lander - it was 1440dv with it's 1.25m tanks, which fell just a tiny bit short of my requirements for a safety margin/maneuvering.
